validations.message: Slug should follow the following pattern: /page-name/
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, and link to asset nodes are allowed
Pencil banners should be sized at 1344 x 400px
Provide at least (4) products to fill the carousel
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, subscript, and strikethrough marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, unordered list, ordered list, quote, horizontal rule, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, block entry, inline entry, and asset nodes are allowed
Only unordered list, link to Url, and link to entry nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, unordered list, ordered list, quote, horizontal rule, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, block entry, inline entry, and asset nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to asset, inline entry, link to entry, and link to Url nodes are allowed
